alert.note: Alert for Benton; Camden; Morgan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 2:32AM CDT until August 01 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Benton County in central Missouri... Northwestern Camden County in central Missouri... Southwestern Morgan County in central Missouri... * Until 330 AM CDT. * At 231 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cole Camp, or 15 miles northeast of Warsaw, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake of The Ozarks, Versailles, Village of Four Seasons, Cole Camp, Stover, Laurie, Sunrise Beach, Gravois Mills, Climax Springs, Lakeview Heights, Crockerville, Zora, Knobby, Hurricane Deck, Edmonson, Edwards, Barnumton, Purvis, Hastain and Green Bay Terrace. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
